nodes.text: A Mysess blossom was a rare type of plant found on the planet of Kashyyyk, normally in the Kkowir Forest. They had yellow, red, and pink petals, and a green stem.
Chief Kerritamba used a Mysess blossom in an elixir he used to cure the illness of the Great Tree.

Mysess blossoms appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
